1000010011001111 0111111110011011 0 -> sum: 0000010001101010, cout: 1
0011010010110000 1011000011010011 0 -> sum: 1110010110000011, cout: 0
1000000100000110 0010010110101101 0 -> sum: 1010011010110011, cout: 0
0110111101001100 0110111001100110 0 -> sum: 1101110110110010, cout: 0
0010101100001100 0011000111101000 1 -> sum: 0101110011110101, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
1111111111111110 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111110, cout: 1
